name: Sarah Abel
bio: Sarah Abel is a senior at the University of Michigan currently pursuing a degree in Communication Studies, but her interests extend far beyond this field. She is an avid traveller and spent last semester exploring continental Europe. As a San Francisco Bay Area native, Sarah spent her last two summers with amazing internships there (obviously Google), but says a piece of her heart will always lie in Ann Arbor... 'too much love for the Maize and Blue!'

name: Scott Rebhun
bio: Scott Rebhun is beginning his senior year at Syracuse University, where he is studying Finance and Accounting with a minor in Global Enterprise Technology. The combination of his passion to leverage new technology and contagious entrepreneurial spirit provides Scott with the energy and enthusiasm to tackle great challenges. SR's drive and ambition is what will propel ideas to fruition in order to solve complex problems for an ever-changing world.

name: Meredith Wadsworth
bio: Meredith is a junior at the University of Virginia, majoring in Media Studies with a minor in Economics. Originally from a suburb of Boston, Ma, Meredith has spent her recent summers in New York City interning with fashion and tech companies. She hopes to pursue a career in the fashion-tech industry, specifically in areas of PR, marketing, and merchandising.

name: Brandon Sticca
bio: Brandon Sticca is a junior at the University of Maryland pursuing a degree in Communication Studies and Marketing. One of UMDâ€™s most socially connected students, Brandon never shies from an opportunity to broaden his personal network. His outgoing personality, ambitious drive, and work ethic make Brandon a great addition to the Chitter U team.

name: Mollie Masucci
bio: Mollie Masucci is a 19 year old marketing major at Penn State University. She is a member of the professional fraternity, Phi Chi Theta, and aspires to be a social/philanthropy char in the semesters to come. In the future, Mollie desires to work in the marketing field with a more hands-on and creative approach.

name: Eric Feldman
bio: Eric Feldman is an Integrated Undergraduate-Graduate student at Penn State University graduating in May 2015 with a B.S. in Labor Employment Relations and a M.S. in Human Resources and Employment Relations. Eric is a driven individual with a passion for people. Eric is a brother of the Penn State chapter of the Alpha Epsilon Pi Fraternity and has held executive board positions for multiple semesters while at Penn State. He has a deep passion for sports and is a strong supporter of all Boston sports teams and of course Penn State Football.

name: Amanda Zwerin
bio: My name is Amanda Zwerin and I live in Long Island, NY. I'm a sophomore Marketing Major at James Madison University. I am a member of Sigma Kappa Sorority and Madison Marketing Association. I enjoy dancing, traveling and taking pictures. I look forward to a career in Marketing and to one day living in New York City.

name: Nolan Cunningham
bio: My name is Nolan Cunningham and I am a Sophomore Marketing and MHR Major here as a part of the Wisconsin School of Business. I'm extremely involved here on campus in student organizations, including Alpha Kappa Psi Professional Business Fraternity and Undergraduate Outreach Committee. If you ever see me out and about on a Badger Gameday or any other time feel free to reach out and say hello!
